on:
  schedule:
    - cron: '0 9 * * *'  # 毎朝9時(UTC)に実行
jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v3
      - name: Set up Python
        uses: actions/setup-python@v4
        with: { python-version: '3.x' }
      - run: pip install requests
      - run: python fetch_top50.py
      - run: git add top50.json && git commit -m 'update top50' && git push
